title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
We are looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our team in Bangalore. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in building scalable web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks.

You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to design, develop, and deploy user-facing features.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using React and TypeScript.
Collaborate with designers to implement UI/UX designs.
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in frontend development.
Proficiency in React, TypeScript, and NextJS.
Strong understanding of responsive design principles.

title: Backend Developer
description:
Join our team as a Backend Developer to build robust APIs and manage databases. You will work on scalable systems to support our growing user base.

This role requires strong problem-solving skills and experience with Node.js.
responsibilities: Design and develop RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express.
Manage MongoDB databases and ensure data integrity.
Work with frontend teams to integrate APIs.
requirements: 3+ years of backend development experience.
Expertise in Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.
Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS.

title: UI/UX Designer
description:
We are seeking a talented UI/UX Designer to create intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for our products.

You will work closely with product managers and developers to bring designs to life.
responsibilities: Create wireframes, prototypes, and final designs using Figma.
Conduct user research to inform design decisions.
Collaborate with developers to ensure design fidelity.
requirements: 2+ years of UI/UX design experience.
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, and Sketch.
Strong portfolio showcasing design projects.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
We are hiring a Full Stack Developer to work on our MERN stack projects. You will be responsible for both frontend and backend development.

This role requires a strong understanding of JavaScript and cloud deployment.
responsibilities: Develop full-stack applications using the MERN stack.
Deploy applications on AWS and ensure scalability.
Work with product teams to define requirements.
requirements: 4+ years of full-stack development experience.
Expertise in MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.
Experience with AWS deployment.

title: Data Scientist
description:
We are looking for a Data Scientist to analyze large datasets and build predictive models. You will work on cutting-edge machine learning projects.

This role requires strong analytical skills and experience with Python.
responsibilities: Analyze and interpret complex datasets.
Build and deploy machine learning models.
Collaborate with stakeholders to present insights.
requirements: 3+ years of data science experience.
Proficiency in Python, SQL, and machine learning frameworks.
Experience with data visualization tools.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Join our team as a DevOps Engineer to manage our cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines. You will ensure smooth deployment and scalability of our applications.

Experience with Docker and Kubernetes is a must.
responsibilities: Set up and manage CI/CD pipelines.
Deploy applications using Docker and Kubernetes.
Monitor and optimize cloud infrastructure.
requirements: 3+ years of DevOps experience.
Expertise in Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD tools.
Familiarity with cloud providers like AWS or Azure.

title: Mobile App Developer
description:
We are seeking a Mobile App Developer to build cross-platform applications using Flutter. You will work on exciting mobile projects for our clients.

Experience with Firebase is a plus.
responsibilities: Develop mobile apps using Flutter and Dart.
Integrate backend APIs and Firebase services.
Ensure app performance and responsiveness.
requirements: 2+ years of mobile app development experience.
Proficiency in Flutter and Dart.
Experience with Firebase and REST APIs.

title: QA Engineer
description:
We are looking for a QA Engineer to ensure the quality of our software products. You will design and execute test cases to identify bugs and improve user experience.

Experience with Selenium is required.
responsibilities: Create and execute test cases using Selenium.
Report and track bugs using JIRA.
Collaborate with developers to resolve issues.
requirements: 2+ years of QA experience.
Proficiency in Selenium and test automation.
Familiarity with JIRA and Agile methodologies.

title: Product Manager
description:
We are hiring a Product Manager to lead the development of our SaaS product. You will define the product roadmap and work with cross-functional teams to deliver value to our customers.

Experience with Agile methodologies is a must.
responsibilities: Define and prioritize product features.
Lead Agile ceremonies like sprint planning and retrospectives.
Collaborate with stakeholders to align on product goals.
requirements: 5+ years of product management experience.
Strong knowledge of Agile and Scrum practices.
Experience in SaaS product development.

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description:
We are seeking a Cybersecurity Analyst to protect our systems from threats. You will conduct penetration testing and monitor security incidents.

Experience with SIEM tools is required.
responsibilities: Conduct penetration testing and vulnerability assessments.
Monitor security incidents using SIEM tools.
Develop and implement security policies.
requirements: 3+ years of cybersecurity experience.
Expertise in penetration testing and SIEM tools.
Knowledge of security frameworks like ISO 27001.
